summary: Completed comprehensive testing of asteroid defense simulation tool. Core functionality (impact calculations, mitigation strategies, 3D visualization) working perfectly. Found 2 backend API issues with NASA data integration and MongoDB serialization.

critical_bugs.issue: NASA NEO API returns 500 error intermittently
critical_bugs.impact: Live tracking tab shows no asteroid data
critical_bugs.details: NASA API sometimes works (200 OK) but often fails (500 error). Likely rate limiting or API key issues.
ValueError: ObjectId object is not iterable - MongoDB ObjectIds not JSON serializable

working_endpoints.status: ✅ Working - Physics calculations accurate and fast
✅ Working - All 3 strategies (kinetic, gravity, nuclear) calculated correctly
✅ Working - Deflection calculations and risk reduction working
✅ Working - Geological assessment for impact locations

integration_issues.issue: No NEO data displayed due to backend API failure
integration_issues.details: Frontend handles error gracefully with loading message, but no data shown

design_issues.issue: Excellent space-themed design with proper gradients and animations
design_issues.status: ✅ No issues - Beautiful 3D space environment with Three.js

passed_tests: ✅ 3D Space Environment - Three.js canvas rendering with animated Earth and asteroids
✅ Tab Navigation - All 3 tabs (Simulation, Defense, Tracking) working perfectly
✅ Asteroid Parameter Inputs - All form fields (diameter, velocity, density, angle) functional
✅ Interactive Map - Leaflet map loads and responds to clicks for location selection
✅ Impact Calculation - Physics calculations working with accurate results display
✅ Mitigation Strategies - All 3 defense strategies displayed with correct parameters
✅ Strategy Simulation - Deflection calculations and risk reduction working
✅ Results Display - Impact and mitigation results properly formatted and displayed
✅ Frontend-Backend Integration - Core simulation workflow end-to-end functional
✅ Error Handling - Frontend gracefully handles backend API failures

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core features working, only NEO data display affected)
success_percentage.integration: 90% (main simulation workflow perfect, only tracking data affected)

action_item_for_E1: Fix NASA NEO API integration - investigate rate limiting and error handling in /api/neo/current endpoint
Fix MongoDB ObjectId serialization in /api/scenarios/history - convert ObjectIds to strings before JSON serialization
Consider implementing fallback/cached NEO data for when NASA API is unavailable
